reference.shortdesc: The xmlpi element identifies mentions of processing instruction names.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The xmlpi element is specialized from markupname, which is defined in the XML-mention domain module. The markupname element is specialized from keyword, which is defined in the markup-name domain module.
